mapper.select:
with baseT as ( select room_type.name name,count(room_type.name) value from orders left join room_type on orders.room_type = room_type.id
and orders.hotel_id = #{hotelId} and orders.is_deleted = 0
group by room_type.name order by value desc )
select * from ( select * from baseT limit 10 ) a union all select '其他',sum(value) from baseT where name not in ( select name from ( select name from baseT limit 10 ) t )

select province name,COUNT(province) value from orders
and hotel_id = #{hotelId} and is_deleted = 0
group by province order by value desc

select ( case way when way = 1 then '到店' else '网单' end ) name,count(way) value from orders
and hotel_id = #{hotelId}
and is_deleted = 0
group by way
select h.province name,count(h.province) value from isolation_info ii left join hotel h on ii.hotel_id = h.id where ii.is_delete = 0 group by h.province
